Quick call summary:
- Ethglobal talks, Nethermind, Prysm and researchers are all presenting. See above link ^
- Nimbus is working on Merge as well. Side-project: Nimbus eth1 fuzzing. Will use Catalyst (Geth) during next month though.

- Testnet plan: 1 day testnet first, test interop. Proto will distribute keystores to client devs and prepare a testnet config/genesis (mainnet-like config, 16k validators). author: protolambda
content: Also, that error about GOPATH mode is because older Go versions didn't go as far with the new go-modules support. Dependency management in Go was always a pain, but Go modules really improved it a lot. New Go versions do the right things by default there, I can't recommend updating enough.
